input_text:
Job Title: Sales & Account Executive

Location: Nashville, TN

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Sales and Account Executive
SummaryBCH is seeking an outgoing, results-driven, relationship-oriented Sales and Account Executive (SAE) to join our organization as a fundamental part of generating new business. The primary role of the SAE is to meet and exceed sales goals by creating new and prosperous relationships while also continuing and growing existing partnerships in the Financial Wellness and Education industry, which is one of the hottest training benefits today. BCH’s award-winning product, Destination: Financial Wellness (DFW), a proprietary unmatched financial wellness program for individuals and families, corporations and academia and government of all levels has been on the market for 21+ years and is ranked best-in-class among our competition. DFW is available in three formats… onsite instruction/virtual instruction, state-of-art online platform and financial coaching. All sales are business-to-business or business-to-government , business-to-academia (no retail sales at this time). The SAE will educate potential clients about our products and services, the financial wellness impact on business and career-readiness, and the qualitative/quantitative impact on bottom line outcomes and profits. The SAE must have the ability to be a self-starter, pre-qualify leads, exhibit a confident and effective command of both cold and warm opportunities, and exemplify a proven ability to harvest and score acceptable sales closure percentages. The ideal candidate must be passionate about enhancing the quality of life and well-being of others through the award-winning BCH financial education and wellness programs and services. At BCH, our success is all about the numbers, but our #1 measurement, and indicator are the number of individuals, families, employees and student lives that we are able to positively impact today and for generations to come, an important outcome which is equally aligned with BCH’s mission and purpose.
Duties and Responsibilities• Meet/exceed sales goals• Become a SME (subject matter expert) on financial wellness using our DFW program• Identify market opportunities and develop a sales plan (i.e., region, industry and company specific)• Identify and qualify prospects through cold and warm leads/calls (in person and social media)• Gain experience with CRM platforms for prospective and sales activities• Organize sales meetings and events• Conduct sales presentations• Create quotes and proposals• Understand the problems and challenges of clients and identify ways BCH can better address those needs• Serve as BCH’s mission spokesperson and community ambassador • Devotion to superior client relations and service • Attend training sessions, exhibitions and events• Compose, proof and edit internal and external communications • Coordinate workshop logistics with clients and end-users• Participate in product development and feedback sessions • Travel may be necessary to include international locations
Competencies• Team player/Integrity/Trustworthy/Compassionate/Empathy• Strong closing skills• Ability to build, foster, and maintain positive professional relationships with senior management in corporate and federal arenas• Solid presentation skills• Excellent written, oral, interpersonal communication skills• Keen analytical and research abilities• Goal driven/work independently• Proficient with Microsoft Office (Word, PowerPoint, Excel, Publisher)
Education and Experience• Undergraduate degree preferred (marketing, management, finance, accounting or related field)• Broadly 5 years sales experience in corporate and/or federal arena (experience in the financial field is a plus)• Zoom, Cisco WebEx and Microsoft Teams virtual meeting platforms (not required but very helpful)
Other Requirements • Work location is onsite (not remote) • Travel is required • Passport is required for international travel • COVID vaccinations and booster required
Compensation• Base salary plus commission (paid quarterly), and profit sharing (paid annually)• Potential annual income $100,000 (w/base salary, commission & annual bonuses)• Benefits include federal holidays, vacation, personal days, 401k with 5% match, maturity and paternity leave, health, vision, dental, and other unique benefits (a limited level of premiums are subsidized by BCH).

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Sales & Account Executive
output_json.summary: Seeking an outgoing, results-driven, relationship-oriented Sales and Account Executive to join our organization.
job_responsibilities: Become a SME on financial wellness using DFW program
Identify market opportunities and develop a sales plan
output_json.travel_requirements: Travel is required including international locations
benefits: Base salary plus commission paid quarterly
